Text: Thank you for this.. are you able to post the past episodes of this season?

I created an account just to post a comment for this torrent..I love KATHY and had been starving for a new episode!! (I live in Japan and her show is not available here)..do you have any other episodes of season 2?
yes - please please upload the other 2 episodes that have been broadcast, i can't get bravo in australia i would LOVE to see them!!

I can only get them if they are upcoming to air as the stream is coming right from the bravo channel. The only past one I'll be able to get is I see one that aired Wed. of this week (with the cast of vanderpump rules) it should air Sunday at 10am so I can cap that one then. If I see anymore that are not up I will try to cap them but usually the show only repeats the same night it airs. :(

Crap! Correction on that. I am sleepy and thought I was replying in the WWHL torrent. THAT episode will repeat. None of the previous Kathy episodes will be reairing again from what I can tell at least for the next 2 weeks. If I see them on the tv guide I will snag them for you guys for sure. I know it sucks missing them. I missed the episode with T.I. and I'm sure that was hilarious knowing Kathy! I will do my best to make sure you guys don't miss anymore from now on! Just help me seed! I am only 1.
You're doing a kick ass job for all those unable to see it. Thanks from myself & the silent majourity.
